mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(writer_no, title, content, created_at, delete_NY) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no as 'postNo', u.user_no as 'writerNo', u.name as 'writer', p.title as 'title', p.content as 'content', p.created_at as 'createdAt', p.delete_NY as 'deletedAt', p.file_path as 'filePath', p.modify_user_no as 'modifyUserNo', p.modified_at as 'modifiedAt' FROM post p INNER JOIN user u ON p.writer_no = u.user_no

SELECT p.post_no as 'postNo', u.user_no as 'writerNo', u.name as 'writer', p.title as 'title', p.content as 'content', p.created_at as 'createdAt', p.delete_NY as 'deletedAt', p.file_path as 'filePath', p.modify_user_no as 'modifyUserNo', p.modified_at as 'modifiedAt' FROM post p INNER JOIN user u ON p.writer_no = u.user_no WHERE p.delete_NY = 'N'
